thread.title: A teenager ran home naked after being dragged into bushes near Paraparaumu and raped
thread.title_full: A teenager ran home naked after being dragged into bushes near Paraparaumu and raped

title: A teenager ran home naked after being dragged into bushes near Paraparaumu and raped
text:
A teenager ran home naked after being dragged into bushes near Paraparaumu and raped Last updated 12:16, February 20 2017 FAIRFAX NZ 
A teenager alleges she was dragged into bushes near Paraparaumu beach and raped. 
A teenager fled naked toward her home after a Paraparaumu man dragged her in bushes at the beach and raped her, a court has heard. 
Jason Haward has pleaded not guilty to rape and unlawful sexual connection before a Wellington District Court jury on Monday. 
The victim's name and identity is suppressed. 
Crown prosecutor Erin FitzHerbert told the jury the 15 year old had been at the beach with a friend on April 21, 2016. She had been drinking. After going to the shops to get food she was walking home when she encountered Haward.
